name: Codenames
description: A classic beloved game of code words and teamwork

name: Drawphone
description: The telephone game, but with pictures

name: Enigma
description: Crack your opponents' code before they crack yours

name: Insider
description: 20 questions, but with a sneaky twist--one player knows the answer!

name: Just One
description: Give clues to a secret word, but don't use the same clue as someone else!

name: Love Letter
description: A competition for the princess's heart

name: One Night Ultimate Werewolf
description: Work together to identify and stop the werewolves

name: Person Do Thing
description: A conversational game where you try to talk with a limited word bank

name: Skribbl
description: A pictionary-like game where everyone has to guess the drawing!

name: QwikWit
description: Try to come up with the most liked answer to various zany questions

name: Snakeout
description: A hidden-roles game. Can you identify the government spies?

name: Spyfall
description: A conversational hidden-role game where one player must figure out the setting

name: Secret Hitler
description: A conversational hidden-role game pitting noble liberals against malevolent facists plotting to overthrow the government

name: Longwave
description: A team-based game of mind-reading and inference

name: 6 Nimmt!
description: A card game where players aim to avoid collecting cards by strategically placing numbered cards in ascending rows
